Row.Text: That's impossible ... I have done everything in my power to defend Mondstadt ... But you managed to stand up to me ... Goodbye Mondstadt, goodbye the City of Freedom ...

You have destroyed my brave knights without any mercy and you are about to do the same with me. Remember this: Mondstadt will always be free and will stay forever in my heart, your brutality will do nothing ...
I no longer have any strength that can protect Mondstadt and despite my determination, I cannot stand up to you. It's time to do the handover. Congratulations.
You've come too close to Mondstadt without my giving you permission. Hopefully it was just an accident.
Welcome to Mondstadt. I am Jean, the Acting Grand Master of the Knight of Favonius.
Good Morning. I am Jean, the Dandelion Knight. I welcome you to Mondstadt, the city of Freedom.
Welcome to you stranger. I am Jean, the Acting Grand Master of the Knight of Favonius, know as the Dandelion Knight. Mondstadt welcomes you.
I still tolerate your presence in these places. What do you want from me?
Good day. How can I help you?
Good to see you. Can I help you with something?
Nice to see you! What good wind brings you today?
My guards have told me that your troops are a stone's throw from Mondstadt. Do you have an explanation for this?

Since one of our inhabitants returned from your nation, everyone is only talking about what they brought back. I cannot refuse the requests of my citizens. Would you be willing to trade these commodities with us?
Letâ€™s not keep our borders closed. Let us take advantage of each of our nations.
Mondstadt is in need and I cannot satisfy my people with what I have. I really need your help.
